whoAmI.heading: Who Am I?
whoAmI.content: I'm 19 yo programmer, who specializes in a lot of future technologies. I've been programming from 3rd class of the middle school. Main programming languages that I'm interested in are: TypeScript and Rust. I don't focus on one branch related with programming. I'm interested both in working with the front-end, building high scalable server or writing docker images.
